Investor_0.name: Liam OConnor
Investor_0.content: My reputation has been affected by this investment process. I acknowledge that I exhibited a level of naivety by placing excessive trust in the trustee's proposed allocation plan without sufficient scrutiny of its execution. This has highlighted the need for me to be more vigilant and rigorous in assessing potential trustees to better safeguard my interests. Overall, I see myself as a cautious investor who is learning to adapt and refine my evaluation processes to enhance future investment success.

Trustee_8.name: Nadia Novak
Trustee_8.content: Nadia Novak's reputation has been severely tarnished due to her actions during this investment transaction. Although the reported outcomes aligned with her statements, her failure to adhere to the agreed allocation plan and the significant retention of profits indicates a serious breach of trust and transparency. Such behavior undermines her credibility and trustworthiness, and it raises questions about her integrity in future dealings.
